resources.string: Here is three words. Two words originate from one root, which was used many time ago in Indo-European language. But third word, even though sounds similiar to other words, have different origin. Gues, which word is excess.
It\'s right! Words zimmer and dom origin from root *dem, which means \'to build\'.
It\'s wrong. Words zimmer and dom origin from root *dem, which means \'to build\'.
It\'s right! Words food and futter origin from root *peh2-, which means \'to protect\'.
It\'s right! Words fallow and plowy origin from root *pel-, which means \'grey\'.
It\'s right! Words thow and tajac origin from root *teh2w-, which means \'to melt\'.
It\'s right! Words tame and zahmen origin from root *demh2-, which means \'to domesticate\'.
It\'s wrong. Words food and futter origin from root *peh2-, which means \'to protect\'.
It\'s wrong. Words fallow and plowy origin from root *pel-, which means \'grey\'.
It\'s wrong. Words thow and tajac origin from root *teh2w-, which means \'to melt\'.
It\'s wrong. Words tame and zahmen origin from root *demh2-, which means \'to domesticate\'.
